about_the_game:
Get a variety of bonuses by registring the serial number to your account for either "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" or "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi Special."

▼To Use
To receive these bonuses, please access "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" and/or "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi Special" and check the Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13 Campaign page in each game.
detailed_description:
Get a variety of bonuses by registring the serial number to your account for either "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" or "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi Special."

▼To Use
To receive these bonuses, please access "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" and/or "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi Special" and check the Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13 Campaign page in each game.

fullgame.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII

name: RTK13 - "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi Special" and "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" Special Bonus 『100万人の三國志』『100万人の三國志 Special』連携特典

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over

short_description: Get a variety of bonuses by registring the serial number to your account for "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" and "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi Special."

Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
